channel.title: Posts on VAPT Walkthroughs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on VAPT Walkthroughs

item.title: Perspective HTB - Insane Windows Box Walkthrough
item.description:
Perspective HTB - Insane Windows Box Walkthrough

Perspective is an Insane difficulty Windows machine from Hack The Box that showcases advanced ASP.NET exploitation techniques. This machine requires expertise in web application security, cryptographic attacks, and Windows privilege escalation, featuring a complex attack chain involving Server-Side Includes, ViewState deserialization, SSRF, and padding oracle attacks.

item.title: Response HTB - Insane Linux Box Walkthrough
item.description:
Response HTB - Insane Linux Box Walkthrough

Response is an Insane difficulty Linux machine from Hack The Box that truly lives up to its rating. This box requires standing up multiple services (web, DNS, SMTP, LDAP) on your attack machine and involves complex multi-stage exploitation including custom proxy development, cross-protocol forgery attacks, memory forensics, and SSH key reconstruction.
